blogPost.excerpt: A free, high-quality pack of PBR textures to add realism to your 3D renders. Use these stunningly detailed textures in any rendering engine to instantly add a pro look. 🪐 Planets + moon 🎨 Colorful marble 👩‍🎨 Flaking paint 🏔 Rough bumps
blogPost.body: A free, high-quality pack of PBR textures to add realism to your 3D renders. Use these stunningly detailed textures in any rendering engine to instantly add a pro look. 🪐 Planets + moon 🎨 Colorful marble 👩‍🎨 Flaking paint 🏔 Rough bumps
blogPost.title: 3D Textures - Free textures to add depth and realism to your renders
blogPost.author: Ivan

localize.description: 一款免费的高质量PBR纹理包，可为您的3D渲染添加真实感。在任何渲染引擎中使用这些令人惊叹的细节纹理，可立即添加专业外观。🪐 行星 + 月亮 🎨 彩色大理石 🎨 剥落的油漆 🏔 粗糙的凸起物。
localize.tagline: 免费纹理，为您的渲染添加深度和真实感。

localize.description: 一款免費的高質量PBR紋理包，可爲您的3D渲染添加真實感。在任何渲染引擎中使用這些令人驚歎的細節紋理，可立即添加專業外觀。🪐 行星 + 月亮 🎨 彩色大理石 🎨 剝落的油漆 🏔 粗糙的凸起物。
localize.tagline: 免費紋理，爲您的渲染添加深度和真實感。
